name: Sweet Talking Panda Baby
description:
Just talk to the Sweet Talking Panda Baby. The cute panda baby answers with his funny voice and reacts to what you say or your touch. With a lot of exciting games with many levels to play!

If you like talking animal games, virtual panda games or animal games in general then you will love Sweet Talking Panda Baby!

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ Talking animal: talking panda baby
✔ Panda game - panda games
✔ The panda repeats everything you say with a funny voice
✔ Fun for the whole family

Sweet Talking Panda Baby is a free application. Download Sweet Talking Panda Baby now and please rate it with 5 stars if you like it.
